name: To the Surface!
description:
Game Overview:

You are a miner, who is stuck at the bottom of a mine. You are trying to climb your way to the surface. 

Take a trip down the memory lane, with this short audio-visual nostalgic piece, that reminds us of the times when Atari 2600 used to be a gaming beast!

Development Team:

Shubham Beri - Game Art/Level Design

Cesar Garcia - Programming

Shubham Bora - Audio/UI Design

Controls:

D/Right Arrow : Move Right

A/Left Arrow : Move Left

S/Down Arrow : Crouch

Spacebar/X (Controller) : Jump

Wall Jump: Jump at wall + Jump + Direction

High Jump : Hold Crouch + Jump
